breadcrumbs: Flight PAX Info Data Model (NEW Release) | Attribute | Type | Description | | :--------------------- | :----------: | :-----------------------------------------------------------------| | pnr | `'string'` | PNR | | pnrCreationDate | `'datetime'` | Date and time of the pnr created in UTC | | pnrStatus | `'string'` | Status of the PNR. ACTIVE or CANCELLED | | flightPaxInfoOrderId | `'string'` | Unique identifier for the NDC order | | orderStatus | `'string'` | Status of the order. ACTIVE or CANCELLED | | tourOperatorCode | `'string'` | Code of the tour operator | | tourOperatorReferenceCode| `'string'` | Reference code of the tour operator | | paxReferenceId | `'string'` | Unique reference identifier for the passenger under the PNR according to the NDC standard.| | forenames | `'string'` | All given names | | surname | `'string'` | Surname | | title | `'string'` | Title of passenger | | gender | `'string'` | Gender of passenger. Female or Male | | birthDate | `'date'` | Passenger's date of birth. | | citizenship | `'string'` | Citizenship country code of passenger | | identityDocumentNumber | `'string'` | National identity number of passenger | | passportNumber | `'string'` | Passport number of passenger | | paxType | `'string'` | Type of passenger. ADULT, CHILD, INFANT, etc. | | segmentReferenceId | `'string'` | Unique reference identifier for the flight under the PNR according to the NDC standard.| | segmentStatus | `'string'` | Status of the segment. OK: ACTIVE, WK: WK CONFIRMED, SB: STANDBY, ATK: AKTP CONFIRMED, SC: SCHEDULE CHANGE, TC: TIME CHANGE, X: CANCELLED, else OTHER| | flightId | `'string'` | Flight identifier. A flight may include multiple flight leg due to operational reasons.| | pnrFlightId | `'string'` | Unique identifier for distinguishing the flight under the PNR. | | udorLocal | `'date'` | Date of origination in local timezone | | carrier | `'string'` | Carrier code, TK, XQ etc. | | flightNumber | `'string'` | Flight number | | departureAirport |

A flight may include multiple flight leg due to operational reasons. | | ssrCode | `'string'` | Special service code | | subSsrCode | `'string'` | Special service subcode | | ssrDescription | `'string'` | Description of the SSR | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Flight PAX Transfer Data Model (NEW Release) | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------------- | :----------: | :-----------------------------------------------------------------| | pnrFlightId | `'string'` | Unique identifier for distinguishing the flight under the PNR. | | transferStatus | `'string'` | Status of the pax transfer. A flight may include multiple flight leg due to operational reasons.| | inBoundTransferPax | `'char'` | Transfer passenger inbound flight indicator. Y or N | | inBoundCarrier | `'string'` | Inbound flight carrier code, TK, XQ etc. | | inBoundFlightNumber | `'string'` | Inbound flight number | | inBoundDepartureAirport | `'string'` | Inbound flight departure airport | | inBoundArrivalAirport | `'string'` | Inbound flight arrival airport | | outBoundTransferPax | `'char'` | Transfer passenger outbound flight indicator. Y or N | | outBoundCarrier | `'string'` | Outbound flight carrier code, TK, XQ etc. | | outBoundFlightNumber | `'string'` | Outbound flight number | | outBoundDepartureAirport| `'string'` | Outbound flight departure airport | | outBoundArrivalAirport | `'string'` | Outbound flight arrival airport | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra Information |
